description: Lists the tags for a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of tags to list.

nested_items.name: ResourceTags
nested_items.description: Adds a tag to a resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The object key of your of your resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The specific value of the resource tag.
